articles.title: Tamannaah Bhatia looks like a daydream in pink and green traditional saree - IndiaTimes
articles.description: Tamannaah Bhatia’s stunning saree is perfect for the upcoming wedding season!
articles.content: For the glam look, Tamannaah opted for nude eyeshadow, black eyeliner, black kohl, mascara-laden eyelashes, feathered eyebrows, contoured cheeks and a shade of nude lipstick.
